name: In Purgamentum
description:
A shady dealer offered you a large sum of money to track down a mysterious signal in an abandoned waste disposal silo. With only a worn out powersuit to protect you, you venture amidst the mountains of garbage to find what treasure may lie within.

Unfortunatly, due to circumstances I wasn't able to work on the game for the last two days so I decided to upload in its current, mostly finished but soundless state, sorry!

Controls:

WASD: move

Mouse: view

Left Mouse: hit
